Description: Loads a bungienet user by membership id.

Parameters.Name: id
Parameters.Description: The requested Bungie.net membership id.

Description: Loads aliases of a bungienet membership id.

Parameters.Name: id
Parameters.Description: The requested Bungie.net membership id.

Description: Returns a list of possible users based on the search string

Parameters.Name: q
Parameters.Description: The search string.

Description: Returns a list of all available user themes.
Returns a list of accounts associated with the supplied membership ID and membership type. This will include all linked accounts (even when hidden) if supplied credentials permit it.

Parameters.Name: membershipId
Parameters.Description: The membership ID of the target user.

Parameters.Name: membershipType
Parameters.Description: Type of the supplied membership ID.

Description: Returns a list of accounts associated with signed in user. This is useful for OAuth implementations that do not give you access to the token response.
Returns a user's linked Partnerships.

Parameters.Name: membershipId
Parameters.Description: The ID of the member for whom partnerships should be returned.

Description: Get topics from any forum.

Parameters.Name: categoryFilter
Parameters.Description: A category filter

Parameters.Name: group
Parameters.Description: The group, if any.

Parameters.Name: locales
Parameters.Description: Comma seperated list of locales posts must match to return in the result list. Default 'en'

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Zero paged page number

Parameters.Name: pageSize
Parameters.Description: Unused

Parameters.Name: quickDate
Parameters.Description: A date filter.

Parameters.Name: sort
Parameters.Description: The sort mode.

Parameters.Name: tagstring
Parameters.Description: The tags to search, if any.

Description: Gets a listing of all topics marked as part of the core group.

Parameters.Name: categoryFilter
Parameters.Description: The category filter.

Parameters.Name: locales
Parameters.Description: Comma seperated list of locales posts must match to return in the result list. Default 'en'

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Zero base page

Parameters.Name: quickDate
Parameters.Description: The date filter.

Parameters.Name: sort
Parameters.Description: The sort mode.

Description: Returns a thread of posts at the given parent, optionally returning replies to those posts as well as the original parent.

Parameters.Name: showbanned
Parameters.Description: If this value is not null or empty, banned posts are requested to be returned

Description: Returns a thread of posts starting at the topicId of the input childPostId, optionally returning replies to those posts as well as the original parent.

Parameters.Name: showbanned
Parameters.Description: If this value is not null or empty, banned posts are requested to be returned

Description: Returns the post specified and its immediate parent.

Parameters.Name: showbanned
Parameters.Description: If this value is not null or empty, banned posts are requested to be returned

Description: Returns the post specified and its immediate parent of posts that are awaiting approval.

Parameters.Name: showbanned
Parameters.Description: If this value is not null or empty, banned posts are requested to be returned

Description: Gets the post Id for the given content item's comments, if it exists.
Gets tag suggestions based on partial text entry, matching them with other tags previously used in the forums.

Parameters.Name: partialtag
Parameters.Description: The partial tag input to generate suggestions from.

Description: Gets the specified forum poll.

Parameters.Name: topicId
Parameters.Description: The post id of the topic that has the poll.

Description: Allows a user to slot themselves into a recuritment thread fireteam slot. Returns the new state of the fireteam.

Parameters.Name: topicId
Parameters.Description: The post id of the recruitment topic you wish to join.

Description: Allows a user to remove themselves from a recuritment thread fireteam slot. Returns the new state of the fireteam.

Parameters.Name: topicId
Parameters.Description: The post id of the recruitment topic you wish to leave.

Description: Allows a recruitment thread owner to kick a join user from the fireteam. Returns the new state of the fireteam.

Parameters.Name: targetMembershipId
Parameters.Description: The id of the user you wish to kick.

Parameters.Name: topicId
Parameters.Description: The post id of the recruitment topic you wish to join.

Description: Allows the owner of a fireteam thread to approve all joined members and start a private message conversation with them.

Parameters.Name: topicId
Parameters.Description: The post id of the recruitment topic to approve.

Description: Allows the caller to get a list of to 25 recruitment thread summary information objects.
Returns the current version of the manifest as a json object.
Returns a list of Destiny memberships given a full Gamertag or PSN ID.

Parameters.Name: displayName
Parameters.Description: The full gamertag or PSN id of the player. Spaces and case are ignored.

Parameters.Name: membershipType
Parameters.Description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type, or All.

Description: Returns Destiny Profile information for the supplied membership.

Parameters.Name: components
Parameters.Description: A comma separated list of components to return (as strings or numeric values).  See the DestinyComponentType enum for valid components to request.  You must request at least one component to receive results.

Parameters.Name: destinyMembershipId
Parameters.Description: Destiny membership ID.

Parameters.Name: membershipType
Parameters.Description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type.

Description: Returns character information for the supplied character.

Parameters.Name: characterId
Parameters.Description: ID of the character.

Parameters.Name: components
Parameters.Description: A comma separated list of components to return (as strings or numeric values).  See the DestinyComponentType enum for valid components to request.  You must request at least one component to receive results.

Parameters.Name: destinyMembershipId
Parameters.Description: Destiny membership ID.

Parameters.Name: membershipType
Parameters.Description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type.

Description: Returns information on the weekly clan rewards and if the clan has earned them or not. Note that this will always report rewards as not redeemed.

Parameters.Name: groupId
Parameters.Description: A valid group id of clan.

Description: Retrieve the details of an instanced Destiny Item.  An instanced Destiny item is one with an ItemInstanceId.  Non-instanced items, such as materials, have no useful instance-specific details and thus are not queryable here.

Parameters.Name: components
Parameters.Description: A comma separated list of components to return (as strings or numeric values).  See the DestinyComponentType enum for valid components to request.  You must request at least one component to receive results.

Parameters.Name: destinyMembershipId
Parameters.Description: The membership ID of the destiny profile.

Parameters.Name: itemInstanceId
Parameters.Description: The Instance ID of the destiny item.

Parameters.Name: membershipType
Parameters.Description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type.

Description: Get currently available vendors.  PREVIEW: This service is not yet active, but we are returning the planned schema of the endpoint for review, comment, and preparation for its eventual implementation.

Parameters.Name: characterId
Parameters.Description: The Destiny Character ID of the character for whom we're getting vendor info.

Parameters.Name: components
Parameters.Description: A comma separated list of components to return (as strings or numeric values).  See the DestinyComponentType enum for valid components to request.  You must request at least one component to receive results.

Parameters.Name: destinyMembershipId
Parameters.Description: Destiny membership ID of another user. You may be denied.

Parameters.Name: membershipType
Parameters.Description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type.

Description: Get the details of a specific Vendor.  PREVIEW: This service is not yet active, but we are returning the planned schema of the endpoint for review, comment, and preparation for its eventual implementation.

Parameters.Name: characterId
Parameters.Description: The Destiny Character ID of the character for whom we're getting vendor info.

Parameters.Name: components
Parameters.Description: A comma separated list of components to return (as strings or numeric values).  See the DestinyComponentType enum for valid components to request.  You must request at least one component to receive results.

Parameters.Name: destinyMembershipId
Parameters.Description: Destiny membership ID of another user. You may be denied.

Parameters.Name: membershipType
Parameters.Description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type.

Parameters.Name: vendorHash
Parameters.Description: The Hash identifier of the Vendor to be returned.

Description: Transfer an item to/from your vault.  You must have a valid Destiny account.  You must also pass BOTH a reference AND an instance ID if it's an instanced item.  itshappening.gif
Equip an item.  You must have a valid Destiny Account, and either be in a social space, in orbit, or offline.
Equip a list of items by itemInstanceIds.  You must have a valid Destiny Account, and either be in a social space, in orbit, or offline.  Any items not found on your character will be ignored.
Set the Lock State for an instanced item.  You must have a valid Destiny Account.

Insert a plug into a socketed item.  I know how it sounds, but I assure you it's much more G-rated than you might be guessing.  We haven't decided yet whether this will be able to insert plugs that have side effects, but if we do it will require special scope permission for an application attempting to do so.  You must have a valid Destiny Account, and either be in a social space, in orbit, or offline.  PREVIEW: This service is not yet active, but we are returning the planned schema of the endpoint for review, comment, and preparation for its eventual implementation.

Activate a Talent Node.  Chill out, everyone: we haven't decided yet whether this will be able to activate nodes with costs, but if we do it will require special scope permission for an application attempting to do so.  You must have a valid Destiny Account, and either be in a social space, in orbit, or offline.  PREVIEW: This service is not actually implemented yet, but we are returning the planned schema of the endpoint for review, comment, and preparation for its eventual implementation.
Gets the available post game carnage report for the activity ID.

Parameters.Name: activityId
Parameters.Description: The ID of the activity whose PGCR is requested.

Description: Gets historical stats definitions.

Gets leaderboards with the signed in user's friends and the supplied destinyMembershipId as the focus.  PREVIEW: This endpoint is still in beta, and may experience rough edges.  The schema is in final form, but there may be bugs that prevent desirable operation.

Parameters.Name: groupId
Parameters.Description: Group ID of the clan whose leaderboards you wish to fetch.

Parameters.Name: maxtop
Parameters.Description: Maximum number of top players to return. Use a large number to get entire leaderboard.

Parameters.Name: modes
Parameters.Description: List of game modes for which to get leaderboards. See the documentation for DestinyActivityModeType for valid values, and pass in string representation, comma delimited.

Parameters.Name: statid
Parameters.Description: ID of stat to return rather than returning all Leaderboard stats.

Description: Gets aggregated stats for a clan using the same categories as the clan leaderboards.  PREVIEW: This endpoint is still in beta, and may experience rough edges.  The schema is in final form, but there may be bugs that prevent desirable operation.

Parameters.Name: groupId
Parameters.Description: Group ID of the clan whose leaderboards you wish to fetch.

Parameters.Name: modes
Parameters.Description: List of game modes for which to get leaderboards. See the documentation for DestinyActivityModeType for valid values, and pass in string representation, comma delimited.

Description: Gets leaderboards with the signed in user's friends and the supplied destinyMembershipId as the focus.  PREVIEW: This endpoint has not yet been implemented.  It is being returned for a preview of future functionality, and for public comment/suggestion/preparation.

Parameters.Name: destinyMembershipId
Parameters.Description: The Destiny membershipId of the user to retrieve.

Parameters.Name: maxtop
Parameters.Description: Maximum number of top players to return. Use a large number to get entire leaderboard.

Parameters.Name: membershipType
Parameters.Description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type.

Parameters.Name: modes
Parameters.Description: List of game modes for which to get leaderboards. See the documentation for DestinyActivityModeType for valid values, and pass in string representation, comma delimited.

Parameters.Name: statid
Parameters.Description: ID of stat to return rather than returning all Leaderboard stats.

Description: Gets leaderboards with the signed in user's friends and the supplied destinyMembershipId as the focus.  PREVIEW: This endpoint is still in beta, and may experience rough edges.  The schema is in final form, but there may be bugs that prevent desirable operation.

Parameters.Name: characterId
Parameters.Description: The specific character to build the leaderboard around for the provided Destiny Membership.

Parameters.Name: destinyMembershipId
Parameters.Description: The Destiny membershipId of the user to retrieve.

Parameters.Name: maxtop
Parameters.Description: Maximum number of top players to return. Use a large number to get entire leaderboard.

Parameters.Name: membershipType
Parameters.Description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type.

Parameters.Name: modes
Parameters.Description: List of game modes for which to get leaderboards. See the documentation for DestinyActivityModeType for valid values, and pass in string representation, comma delimited.

Parameters.Name: statid
Parameters.Description: ID of stat to return rather than returning all Leaderboard stats.

Description: Gets a page list of Destiny items.

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Page number to return, starting with 0.

Parameters.Name: searchTerm
Parameters.Description: The string to use when searching for Destiny entities.

Parameters.Name: type
Parameters.Description: The type of entity for whom you would like results.  These correspond to the entity's definition contract name.  For instance, if you are looking for items, this property should be 'DestinyInventoryItemDefinition'.  PREVIEW: This endpoint is still in beta, and may experience rough edges.  The schema is tentatively in final form, but there may be bugs that prevent desirable operation.

Description: Gets historical stats for indicated character.  PREVIEW: This endpoint is still in beta, and may experience rough edges.  The schema is in final form, but there may be bugs that prevent desirable operation.

Parameters.Name: characterId
Parameters.Description: The id of the character to retrieve. You can omit this character ID or set it to 0 to get aggregate stats across all characters.

Parameters.Name: dayend
Parameters.Description: Last day to return when daily stats are requested.  Use the format YYYY-MM-DD.

Parameters.Name: daystart
Parameters.Description: First day to return when daily stats are requested. Use the format YYYY-MM-DD

Parameters.Name: destinyMembershipId
Parameters.Description: The Destiny membershipId of the user to retrieve.

Parameters.Name: groups
Parameters.Description: Group of stats to include, otherwise only general stats are returned. Comma separated list is allowed. Values: General, Weapons, Medals

Parameters.Name: membershipType
Parameters.Description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type.

Parameters.Name: modes
Parameters.Description: Game modes to return. See the documentation for DestinyActivityModeType for valid values, and pass in string representation, comma delimited.

Parameters.Name: periodType
Parameters.Description: Indicates a specific period type to return. Optional. May be: Daily, AllTime, or Activity

Description: Gets aggregate historical stats organized around each character for a given account.  PREVIEW: This endpoint is still in beta, and may experience rough edges.  The schema is in final form, but there may be bugs that prevent desirable operation.

Parameters.Name: destinyMembershipId
Parameters.Description: The Destiny membershipId of the user to retrieve.

Parameters.Name: groups
Parameters.Description: Groups of stats to include, otherwise only general stats are returned.  Comma separated list is allowed. Values: General, Weapons, Medals.

Parameters.Name: membershipType
Parameters.Description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type.

Description: Gets activity history stats for indicated character.  PREVIEW: This endpoint is still in beta, and may experience rough edges.  The schema is in final form, but there may be bugs that prevent desirable operation.

Parameters.Name: characterId
Parameters.Description: The id of the character to retrieve.

Parameters.Name: count
Parameters.Description: Number of rows to return

Parameters.Name: destinyMembershipId
Parameters.Description: The Destiny membershipId of the user to retrieve.

Parameters.Name: membershipType
Parameters.Description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type.

Parameters.Name: mode
Parameters.Description: A filter for the activity mode to be returned. None returns all activities. See the documentation for DestinyActivityModeType for valid values, and pass in string representation.

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Page number to return, starting with 0.

Description: Gets details about unique weapon usage, including all exotic weapons.  PREVIEW: This endpoint is still in beta, and may experience rough edges.  The schema is in final form, but there may be bugs that prevent desirable operation.

Parameters.Name: characterId
Parameters.Description: The id of the character to retrieve.

Parameters.Name: destinyMembershipId
Parameters.Description: The Destiny membershipId of the user to retrieve.

Parameters.Name: membershipType
Parameters.Description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type.

Description: Gets all activities the character has participated in together with aggregate statistics for those activities.  PREVIEW: This endpoint is still in beta, and may experience rough edges.  The schema is in final form, but there may be bugs that prevent desirable operation.

Parameters.Name: characterId
Parameters.Description: The specific character whose activities should be returned.

Parameters.Name: destinyMembershipId
Parameters.Description: The Destiny membershipId of the user to retrieve.

Parameters.Name: membershipType
Parameters.Description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type.

Description: Gets custom localized content for the milestone of the given hash, if it exists.

Parameters.Name: milestoneHash
Parameters.Description: The identifier for the milestone to be returned.

Description: Gets public information about currently available Milestones.
Returns community content.

Parameters.Name: mediaFilter
Parameters.Description: The type of media to get

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Zero based page

Parameters.Name: sort
Parameters.Description: The sort mode.

Description: Returns info about community members who are live streaming.

Parameters.Name: modeHash
Parameters.Description: The hash of the Activity Mode for which streams should be retrieved.  Don't pass it in or pass 0 to not filter by mode.

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Zero based page.

Parameters.Name: partnershipType
Parameters.Description: The type of partnership for which the status should be returned.

Parameters.Name: sort
Parameters.Description: The sort mode.

Parameters.Name: streamLocale
Parameters.Description: The locale for streams you'd like to see.  Don't pass this to fall back on your BNet locale.  Pass 'ALL' to not filter by locale.

Description: Returns info about community members who are live streaming in your clans.

Parameters.Name: page
Parameters.Description: Zero based page.

Parameters.Name: partnershipType
Parameters.Description: The type of partnership for which the status should be returned.

Parameters.Description: The sort mode.

Description: Returns info about Featured live streams.

Parameters.Description: Zero based page.

Parameters.Name: partnershipType
Parameters.Description: The type of partnership for which the status should be returned.

Parameters.Name: streamLocale
Parameters.Description: The locale for streams you'd like to see.  Don't pass this to fall back on your BNet locale.  Pass 'ALL' to not filter by locale.

Description: Gets the Live Streaming status of a particular Account and Membership Type.

Parameters.Name: membershipId
Parameters.Description: The membershipId related to that type.

Parameters.Name: membershipType
Parameters.Description: The type of account for which info will be extracted.

Parameters.Name: partnershipType
Parameters.Description: The type of partnership for which info will be extracted.

Description: Returns trending items for Bungie.net, collapsed into the first page of items per category.  For pagination within a category, call GetTrendingCategory.
Returns paginated lists of trending items for a category.

Parameters.Name: categoryId
Parameters.Description: The ID of the category for whom you want additional results.

Parameters.Name: pageNumber
Parameters.Description: The page # of results to return.

Description: Returns the detailed results for a specific trending entry.  Note that trending entries are uniquely identified by a combination of *both* the TrendingEntryType *and* the identifier: the identifier alone is not guaranteed to be globally unique.

Parameters.Name: identifier
Parameters.Description: The identifier for the entity to be returned.

Parameters.Name: trendingEntryType
Parameters.Description: The type of entity to be returned.
